pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: koneksi, persatuan, bergabung, tautan; berganti kereta

lessons.japanese: 過去にフレッチャー石油は日本企業から接触を受けた。
lessons.indonesian: In the past, Fletcher Fuel was approached by Japanese companies.

lessons.japanese: トラックが橋梁に接触した。
lessons.indonesian: A truck came into contact with the bridge supports.

lessons.japanese: 父は海外にいる間、手紙や電話でわれわれと接触し続けた。
lessons.indonesian: Father kept in touch with us by mail and telephone while he was overseas.

lessons.japanese: 父は海外にいる間、手紙や電話でわれわれと接触し続けた。
lessons.indonesian: My father kept in touch with us by mail and telephone while he was overseas.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は外国人と接触する機会がない。
lessons.indonesian: She has no chances of coming in contact with foreigners.

lessons.japanese: 彼は色々な種類の人と接触する。
lessons.indonesian: He comes into contact with all kinds of people.

lessons.japanese: 彼は色々な種類の人と接触する。
lessons.indonesian: He is in touch with all kinds of people.

lessons.japanese: 彼は私が誘拐犯人と接触出来るようにしてくれた。
lessons.indonesian: He put me in touch with the kidnappers.

lessons.japanese: 彼はあらゆる種類の人と接触する。
lessons.indonesian: He comes into contact with all kinds of people.

lessons.japanese: 彼と接触を保ってはいけない。
lessons.indonesian: You must not keep in touch with him.
